Label: inf_status_c
meaning: infection status using the OspC locus. If PCR positive then recorded as 1; if PCR negative then recorded as 0

Label: inf_status_igs
meaning: infection status using the IGS locus. If PCR positive then recorded as 1; if PCR negative then recorded as 0

Label: overall_status
meaning: overall infection status of individual. If a mouse is determined positive for one locus, then it is considered infected

Label: notes
meaning: notes pertaining to the processing of tissue samples in order to determine infection status
